info.brief_description: Senior year girls seduce a Straight-A student who is hiding the answers to the final exam.
info.description:
Third person perspective. The main character is Marty Zimp, a meek, shy senior 18-year old student at a high school. An avarage looking kid with brown hair.

Takes place in a private school, with uniforms.

He gets commissioned by the principal to hide the answer sheets to the final exam at his house so they wouldn't get stolen from his office. However, several girls find out about this and try to seduce him to get the answers.

All girls must be senior eighteen year-olds. No underage.

The girls are:

Olivia Feltzer - One of the three sluttiest girls in Marty's classclass. She is medium height, long blonde hair and has C-cup breasts and an alright ass. Always hangs out with her friend April.

Candy Burt - One of the class' smartest girls, but who couldn't study for the final exam and will do anything to pass. One of Marty's best female friends who has long black-hair. She has moderately large C-cups tits and a good ass.

Camille Gastling - Considered the classes' hottest girl because of her very skinny frame, yet her unusually large D-cup breasts. Very sweet and kind, though not enough to be scrupulous. She has short light brown hair that she keeps in a ponytail.

Billie Dolph - A cute and nice girl, who is kind of a cocktease but not a slut. She has long brown-hair and wears it in a pony-tail. She has small B-cup boobs but a nice, tight ass. She also hides some hidden powers...

No scat. No toilet. No feet worship. Any of that will be deleted. Also, authro reserves the right to delete chapters, especially if they have a lot of grammatical errors or are just badly-written and one paragraph long. Other than that, enjoy and have fun!
